Class RandomTrader

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trader
      • RandomTrader

  • public class RandomTrader
extends Trader
    The Class RandomTrader is responsible for setting up a trader that acts randomly on the market.
    Author:
    Jonathan Magbadelo
